text: Geneviève Claisse (17 July 1935, in Quiévy – 30 April 2018, in Dreux) was a French geometrical abstract painter. Her first personal exhibits in the Galerie Caille in Cambrai and Galerie Hybler in Paris in 1958. Her arts were displayed at museums in Oslo and Paris. ==References== ==Other websites== *Geneviève Claisse personal testimony Category:1935 births Category:2018 deaths Category:French painters
title: Geneviève Claisse
